 2002-01922002-02-080,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PTB, 
PrecisRegulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, NO. 1 by, inter alia, ensuring that survivor benefits provided under the military and RCMP pension plans comply with the requirements of the Income Tax Act and Regulations and by updating provisions affected by the enactment of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0073 Publication Date: 2002-02-27
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS,
NO. 1 by, inter alia, ensuring that survivor benefits provided under the
military and RCMP pension plans comply with the requirements of the Income
Tax Act and Regulations and by updating provisions affected by the
enactment of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board Act.
